title: Lorentz-invariant wave propagation validates modified KG baseline
summary: Stable Lorentz-invariant propagation in the lattice indicates the modified Klein–Gordon baseline reproduces special relativistic behavior within tolerance.
derivation: REL-* tests measure isotropy and invariance; dispersion within expected stencil error bands implies no unphysical preferred frame at tested scales.
chain_of_reasoning: If lattice supports Lorentz-invariant modes → relativistic kinematics are preserved
Preserved kinematics → downstream EM and gravity-analogue models can be consistent
Therefore core PDE is a plausible substrate for multi-physics unification
prior_art_delta: Discretized modified KG with spatially varying χ validated against an energy-first harness with GPU reproducibility.
severity_if_false: Undermines all chained implications relying on relativistic fidelity.

title: Energy conservation within 1e-4 enables long-horizon simulations
summary: Observed low drift enables thousands of steps without renormalization, allowing reliable metric extraction.
derivation: Tier 3 energy tests bound drift; Verlet temporal scheme shows dt^2 scaling; spatial dispersion dominates but controlled by dx.
chain_of_reasoning: Low drift → trust integral quantities (energy, momentum)
Trusted integrals → validates emergent behaviors (binding, tunneling) measured over time
prior_art_delta: Energy-first validation embedded into harness and gating process.
severity_if_false: Metrics over long runs become unreliable.

title: χ-field as potential landscape for gravity analogue
summary: Spatial modulation of χ produces redshift/time-dilation analogues observable in wave propagation timing.
derivation: Modified mass term shifts local dispersion; wave packet delays and frequency shifts mimic gravitational potential.
chain_of_reasoning: χ gradient → dispersion shift → group velocity modulation
Group delay differences → red/blue shift analogue
prior_art_delta: Field-mass modulation approach anchored to lattice KG with validated energy conservation.
severity_if_false: Gravity analogue path weakens; other domains unaffected.

title: Quantum tunneling metrics reproducible without cryogenics

prior_art_delta: Energy-first validation and canonical χ barrier construction with GPU-backed reproducibility.

summary: Cloaks (IMP-024) upgraded with online χ optimization to counter adaptive radars and multi-band illumination in real time.
derivation: Embed controller (IMP-029) that estimates incident spectra and re-optimizes χ shell.
chain_of_reasoning: Controller updates χ → persistent low signature
prior_art_delta: Closed-loop χ-cloaking on energy-gated lattice substrate.
severity_if_false: Cloak limited to static, single-band scenarios.

title: Compute: Temporal wave coprocessor for on-device inference
summary: Package delay lines (IMP-019) and reservoir blocks (IMP-047) as a coprocessor for low-power pattern tasks.
derivation: Leverage stable interference and memory primitives to accelerate time-series and keyword spotting.
prior_art_delta: Unified χ-substrate primitives in a deployable accelerator spec.

title: Inverse: χ reconstruction marketplace and benchmark
summary: Host leaderboards for inverse χ estimation (IMP-016) across modalities with standard metrics and datasets.
derivation: Package datasets, eval code, and baselines; encourage community submissions.
prior_art_delta: First unified inverse χ benchmark spanning EM/quantum analogues.

title: Policy: Reproducible Science Certificate (RSC) for simulators
summary: Formal certificate awarded to projects implementing energy-first validation, GPU determinism, and registry-linked evidence.
derivation: Codify IMP-009 and IMP-018 patterns into a public certification.
prior_art_delta: Energy-audited certificate framework for PDE codes.

title: RF: χ-designed front-end reference stacks (LNA+filters+match)
summary: Bundle waveguide/filters (IMP-010, IMP-054) and near-field shapers (IMP-048) into reference RF front-ends for simulation-to-hardware transfer.
derivation: Pipeline from χ inverse design → co-simulation → manufacturable constraints.
prior_art_delta: System-level χ design kit with energy auditing.

title: MedTech: Patient-specific ultrasound χ-twins for procedure planning
summary: Construct individual χ maps from scans to simulate ultrasound procedures and optimize parameters.
derivation: Extend IMP-028 with inversion (IMP-016) to fit χ to patient data.
prior_art_delta: Energy-audited patient-specific χ twin workflow.

title: DevTools: Differentiable χ programming language (ChiLang)
summary: A DSL to declare goals (spectra, fields) and auto-synthesize χ via differentiable or hybrid solvers.
derivation: Unify IMP-014 inverse design with phase retrieval (IMP-035) and compressed sensing (IMP-053).
prior_art_delta: First domain-specific language for χ-field synthesis across modalities.

title: Education: Turnkey curriculum-in-a-box with live validators
summary: A packaged course where every lab auto-validates against canonical metrics (IMP-021, IMP-050).
derivation: Bundle website labs, rubrics, and result upload checks.
prior_art_delta: Live GPU-validated physics labs packaged for institutions.

title: Astro: χ-lensing inversion challenge with telescope partners
summary: Coordinate with observatories to benchmark lens inversion using χ-analogue datasets that mimic real observations.
derivation: Extend IMP-059 with noise models, PSFs, and cadence matching real instruments.
chain_of_reasoning: Better pipelines → more science per photon
prior_art_delta: Cross-instrument χ-analogue datasets with energy auditing.

title: Safety: Causality-guarded boundary library with proofs
summary: Provide boundary condition implementations with machine-checked proofs of subluminality and energy behavior.
derivation: Combine IMP-055 causality checks with IMP-082 proof artifacts.
prior_art_delta: BC implementations accompanied by formal invariants for lattice KG.

title: Sensing: Quantum-like gravimeter analogue based on χ-phase shifts
summary: Use interference sensitivity (IMP-020) within χ gradients (IMP-003) to build an analogue gravimeter for field-deployable tests.
derivation: Phase accumulation over paths through χ gradient encodes acceleration.
prior_art_delta: Non-cryogenic gravimeter analogue leveraging unified substrate.

title: Lidar: Holographic χ-beamforming for multi-return robustness
summary: Use χ phase plates (IMP-043) and apodization (IMP-032) to form beams optimized for cluttered scenes and rain/fog.
derivation: Inverse χ design to shape PSF and sidelobes for multi-return environments.
prior_art_delta: KG-based lidar beam synthesis with energy guardrails.
severity_if_false: Standard beams with degraded performance in clutter.

title: Control: χ feedback toolkit with safety envelopes and proofs
summary: Package controllers (IMP-029) with safety envelopes (IMP-052) and formal guarantees (IMP-082) for χ-driven systems.
derivation: Integrate energy monitors and causality guards into control loops.
chain_of_reasoning: Add safety proofs → deploy with confidence
prior_art_delta: First χ-control library with formal safety contracts.

title: Publishing: Journal plugin for evidence-linked submissions
summary: A plugin that ingests registry-linked bundles (IMP-060) and verifies runs before peer review.
derivation: Automate validation in editorial workflows.
prior_art_delta: Direct integration of canonical validator into journals.

title: Security: Immutable evidence ledger for simulation results
summary: Store hashes and signatures (IMP-058) on an optional append-only ledger to prevent tampering.
derivation: Chain-of-custody for evidence bundles enhances trust across organizations.
prior_art_delta: Ties physics validation artifacts to immutable audit trails.
severity_if_false: Evidence can be contested more easily.

title: Governance: IP and safety playbook for χ-substrate research
summary: Codify two-track IP (IMP-041) and international governance (IMP-079) into a practical playbook for labs.
